service.name: Hazardous waste permits
service.description: If you want to export, import or transit hazardous waste, as defined under the Hazardous Waste Act, you must first apply for a permit. The type of hazardous waste permit required will depend on the country of destination (export) and origin (import). Please contact the Hazardous Waste Section who will provide you with specific advice and guidance on your particular circumstances.

Dimension.name: Department of the Environment

The environmental framework is being delivered under four pillars: Clean air, Clean water, Clean lan, National Heritage
